snippet.title: Wuppo Gameplay Trailer - PEGI
snippet.description:
Check out the NEW version of the game & trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hhH6dc3xeDA 
Wuppo is now available on Steam, GOG, Xbox One & PS4!

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/400630/Wuppo/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/wuppo
Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/store/p/wuppo/brbpw76hgkhb
PS4: https://store.playstation.com/en-en/product/EP4541-CUSA08533_00-WUPPOEU000000000

Play as an exiled 'wum' looking for a new home in this bizarre but charming world, filled with strange creatures, puzzles, monsters and political chaos.

FEATURES
- Explore a wondrous world filled with Wums, Fnakkers and other strange creatures.
- Resolve an ancient conflict on your quest for a new home.
- Use items and social skills to overcome diverse challenges.
- Fight numerous enemies, ranging from small, to big, to MASSIVE!
- Collect filmstrips to discover the world's detailed history.
- Enjoy an enchanting and memorable orchestrated soundtrack.

---
HI :D Here's the final gameplay trailer for Wuppo for all platforms. Sharing would be greatly appreciated! And we love comments. Thanks for the ongoing support since the launch on PC. Thanks to you we were able to bring it to consoles too ^_____^ Cheers!

Wuppo website:
http://wuppogame.com

Knuist & Perzik website:
http://knuistperzik.com

Wuppo Reddit:
https://www.reddit.com/r/Wuppo/

Knuist & Perzik Discord:
https://discord.gg/t5YqxDG

#Wuppo #gameplay #trailer
